original_title: Nx Zero - 62 Mil Horas Até Aqui
overview: 62,000 Hours Until Here is a studio DVD of the band NX Zero, released in March 2008. It is the first DVD of the band. It mixes old songs and new hits of the band, besides testimonies of the members and video clips of "Razões e Emoções", "Além de Mim" and "Pela Ultima Vez".
title: 62,000 Hours Until Here
